https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pK9CugRd3DIP0THBH8WlGrvk5vy.jpg When his fiancee is kidnapped by human traffickers, Roman and his ex-military brothers set out to track her down and save her before it is too late. Along the way, Roman teams up with Avery, a cop investigating human trafficking and fighting the corrupt bureaucracy that has harmful intentions. Acts of Violence
